name: TruthTimesUpdate
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des: Listen to daily updates from Truth For The Times. Truth Times Update is a 60 second podcast of headlines of Christian news, reviews, and commentary for the Narrow Road Follower of Jesus from TruthForTheTimes.klptv.com. “The person who tells one side of a story seems right, until someone else comes and asks questions.” Proverbs 18:17 (NCV) So do not let anyone deceive you! Add this to your flash briefing and then you can just say "Alexa, what's my flash briefing". You can say "Alexa, stop" to exit anytime.
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
